heading: Welcome to ORBI
paragraph: Established in 2025 as a student-led R&D initiative at NERIST, ORBI—Orbital Research & Beyond Innovations—serves as a multidisciplinary incubator for transformative ideas. We bridge the gap between academic theory and real-world application, fostering a culture of curiosity-driven exploration in aerospace, AI, and sustainable technologies to shape the future of innovation in the Northeast and beyond.
